item.title: CPU Scheduling and process and thread
item.description: The rest of your content lives here. You can use Markdown here :) Process scheduling is an important activity done by the process manager to remove the process from the CPU and schedule the next process, the process removal and dispatch are based on multiple factors like process completion, priority, I/O requirement, etc.

item.title: Debouncing And Throttling
item.description: Debouncing is a programming practice used to ensure that time-consuming tasks do not fire so often, which can cause performance issues. In essence, it limits the execution of a function until a certain amount of idle time has passed without it being triggered again.

item.title: Message Broker ChatGPT Learnings
item.description: In RabbitMQ, workers and consumers are related but not necessarily the same thing. Hereâ€™s the distinction: Consumer: A consumer in RabbitMQ refers to any application or service that subscribes to a queue and processes the messages from that queue.

item.title: Mongodb Connection and mongoose behind the scene
item.description: Mongoose is an Object Data Modeling (ODM) library for MongoDB and Node.js, which simplifies how you interact with MongoDB. It provides an abstraction over MongoDBâ€™s native driver to work with collections and documents in a more structured way.
